title: How to Make a Candy Cane Shot

steps.headline: Fill a cocktail shaker or glass halfway with ice cubes.
Measure and pour the ingredients into the glass.
Place a lid or another glass on top of it and secure.
Shake well until everything is mixed thoroughly.
Pour into a 2 ounce shot glass.

text: Fill a cocktail shaker or glass halfway with ice cubes.  Measure and pour the ingredients into the glass.  Place a lid or another glass on top of it and secure.  Shake well until everything is mixed thoroughly.  Pour into a 2 ounce shot glass.  Finished.
